recipes.name: White Sauce Pasta
recipes.description: Creamy white sauce pasta with a rich cheesy flavor.
recipes.instructions: Boil pasta, prepare sauce, mix and serve.

recipes.name: Masala Dosa
recipes.description: Crispy South Indian dosa filled with spicy potato stuffing.
recipes.instructions: Prepare batter, cook dosa, add stuffing, and serve.

recipes.name: Mint Mojito
recipes.description: Refreshing mint-flavored mojito with a twist of lime.
recipes.instructions: Crush mint, mix with lime and sugar, add soda, and serve.
